law.catch_line: Should the viewers when making their examination and surveys, find that the drainage scheme when car...
law.text: Should the viewers when making their examination and surveys, find that the drainage scheme when carried out will benefit any public highway or any railroad or other public property, then and in that case the viewers shall in their return assess the State, county or corporation an amount which they consider just for the benefits which will be derived through the formation of the drainage district.
